cost.label: Action Cost
cost.hint: Configure the cost of using this action in Action Points, Focus Points, or Heroism.

action.label: Action
action.hint: The base cost of this action in Action points.

focus.label: Focus
focus.hint: The base cost of this action in Focus points.

heroism.label: Heroism
heroism.hint: The base cost of this action in Heroism points.

weapon.label: Add Weapon Cost
weapon.hint: Is the equipped weapon's Action Point cost added to the cost for this Action?

id.label: Identifier
id.hint: Provide a standardized camel-case alphanumeric identifier for this action. This identifier should be unique across all actions in the system.

condition.label: Triggering Condition
condition.hint: Additional reference text which clarifies the prerequisite triggering conditions under which an action may be used.

description.label: Action Description
description.hint: A text description of how the action functions mechanically.

tags.label: Action Tags
tags.hint: Add tags which define the requirements, behavior, and modifiers of this action. The order of tags matters as later tags will take priority over earlier ones if they modify the same properties of the action.

scope.label: Affected Scope
scope.hint: Which disposition of targets are affected by this action?

type.label: Target Type
type.hint: Which type of target or area is affected by this action?

number.label: Target Number
number.hint: How many of the selected target type are affected by this action?

size.label: Target Size
size.hint: Certain target types are further modified by a size in feet.

limit.label: Maximum Targets
limit.hint: Limit the effect of this action to a maximum number of individual target characters? By default, all targets will be affected.

multiple.label: Multiple Applications
multiple.hint: Apply the effects of this action multiple times per target? By default, the action will apply once per target.

self.label: Target Self
self.hint: Automatically target yourself if appropriate for the configured action target scope and type.

range.label: Action Range
range.hint: Define a minimum or maximum range in feet at which this action may be performed.

weapon.label: Use Weapon Range
weapon.hint: The range of this action is defined by the effective range of the used weapon.

actionHooks.label: Action Hooks
actionHooks.hint: BEWARE! Action hooks are an ADVANCED feature for automating action mechanics. Mis-configuring these hooks can have serious consequences. Do not attempt to make changes unless you are confident in your own knowledge.

currency.label: Currency Amount
currency.hint: The amount of currency possessed by this Actor.

appearance.label: Appearance
appearance.hint: Descriptive information about the outward appearance of this actor which is visible to anyone with at least Limited permission.

public.label: Public Biography
public.hint: Biographical information about this actor which is visible to anyone with at least limited permission.

private.label: Private Biography
private.hint: Private information about this actor which is only visible to owners of the actor.

size.label: Size
size.tooltip: The number of grid spaces squared occupied by this creature.

sizeBonus.label: Size Bonus
sizeBonus.hint: An additive modifier to the base size of the creature defined by Ancestry or Taxonomy.

stride.label: Stride
stride.tooltip: Movement distance per spent Action Point.

strideBonus.label: Stride Bonus
strideBonus.hint: An additive modifier to Stride speed of the Actor defined by Ancestry or Taxonomy.

engagement.label: Engagement
engagement.tooltip:
Number of Enemies Engaged
(Size - 2) + Engagement Bonus

engagementBonus.label: Engagement Bonus
engagementBonus.hint: An additive modifier to base engagement.

LABELS.WEAPONS_HINT: Equip weapons from your Backpack toggling the shield icon.
LABELS.ARMOR_HINT: Equip armor from your Backpack toggling the shield icon.
LABELS.ACCESSORIES_HINT: Equip up to {slots} accessories from your Backpack toggling the shield icon.
LABELS.CONSUMABLES_HINT: Equip up to {slots} consumables from your Backpack toggling the shield icon.
LABELS.BACKPACK_HINT: Add items by dropping them from the provided Crucible system compendium packs.
LABELS.KNOWLEDGE_HINT: Learn some Knowledge Areas from your Background or edit your Hero to gain some.

milestones.label: Milestones Earned
milestones.hint: The number of milestones that have been earned by this group.

identifier.label: Identifier
identifier.hint: A string identifier used to uniquely reference this Ancestry in tags, actions, or other UI elements. This identifier must be alphanumeric with no spaces or special characters.

size.label: Size
size.hint: The size of this ancestry in grid spaces.

stride.label: Stride
stride.hint: The starting movement speed of this Ancestry in grid spaces.

primary.label: Primary Ability
primary.hint: Select a primary ability score which begins at 3.

secondary.label: Secondary Ability
secondary.hint: Select a secondary ability score which begins at 2.

resistances.label: Damage Resistances
resistances.hint: You must choose both a Resistance and a Vulnerability if you select either.

resistance.label: Damage Resistance
resistance.hint: A biological Resistance (+3) to a certain damage type.

vulnerability.label: Damage Vulnerability
vulnerability.hint: A biological Vulnerability (-3) to a certain damage type.

talents.label: Talent Progression
talents.hint: Configure one or more Talents that this Ancestry receives automatically.

color.label: Ancestry Color
color.hint: A representative color for this Ancestry used when referring to them in the user interface.

icon.label: Ancestry Icon
icon.hint: A small icon used to represent this Ancestry in the user interface.

WARNINGS.ABILITIES: The primary and secondary Abilities for an Ancestry may not be the same.
WARNINGS.RESISTANCES_BOTH: You must assign both Resistance and Vulnerability if defining either.
WARNINGS.RESISTANCES_DIFFERENT: The chosen Resistance and Vulnerability for an Ancestry may not be the same.

ACTION.WarningCannotUse: {name} does not satisfy the prerequisites to use {action}: {reason}
ACTION.WarningCannotAffordMove: {name} has insufficient action to move this distance which requires {cost}A!
ACTION.WarningCannotSpendAction: {name} cannot spend Action because they are Paralyzed!
ACTION.WarningCannotSpendFocus: {name} cannot spend Focus because they are currently {status}!
ACTION.WarningInvalidTarget: You must designate at least one {type} target for {action}!
ACTION.WarningCannotTargetSelf: You cannot target yourself with this Action!
ACTION.WarningIncorrectTargets: You may only designate up to {number} {type} targets for {action}!
ACTION.WarningRequireTemplate: You must place a Measured Template to indicate the area of effect of {action}.
ACTION.WarningMinimumRange: A selected target is closer than the minimum range of {min} feet.
ACTION.WarningMaximumRange: A selected target is further than the maximum range of {max} feet.
ACTION.TagAfterStrikeTooltip: This action may only be performed immediately after a basic Strike attack which did not critically miss.
ACTION.TagConsumeTooltip: This action involves and requires consumption of a specific consumable item
ACTION.TagDeadlyTooltip: This action has the potential to deal a tremendous amount of damage, increasing the damage multiplier for any damage dealt by x1.
ACTION.TagDifficultTooltip: This action is complicated or challenging to perform. You incur 2 additional banes when attempting the action.
ACTION.TagDisarmTooltip: This action, if successful, causes the target's weapon to be dropped.
ACTION.TagDualWieldTooltip: This action requires wielding two separate weapons or being entirely unarmed to perform.
ACTION.TagEmpoweredTooltip: This action is powerful and deals additional damage, gaining a +2 damage bonus if successful.
ACTION.TagAccurateTooltip: This action is particularly accurate. You gain 2 additional Boons when performing the action.
ACTION.TagFinesseTooltip: This action requires a certain amount of finesse to perform. You must be wielding a weapon which scales using Dexterity.
ACTION.TagFlankingTooltip: This action may only be performed against a flanked or unaware target.
ACTION.TagFreehandTooltip: This action requires at least one hand which is not currently holding an object to perform.
ACTION.TagBruteTooltip: This action involves the application of brute force and requires a weapon which scales using Strength.
ACTION.TagGenericTooltip: Actions which perform a generic attack without using a specific spell or weapon.
ACTION.TagHarmlessTooltip: This action does not impose a directly harmful effect, its damage multiplier is zero.
ACTION.TagHealingTooltip: This action provides restoration by testing an ally's Wounds threshold.
ACTION.TagWeakenedTooltip: This action is weaker than normal attacks and has a -2 damage bonus.
ACTION.TagMechanicalTooltip: This action requires use of a mechanical weapon.
ACTION.TagMeleeTooltip: This action requires wielding a melee weapon or being unarmed to perform.
ACTION.TagMainHandTooltip: This action utilizes your main-hand weapon to make an attack.
ACTION.TagMovementTooltip: This action allows you to move as part of its activation, including a reduced action point cost for a free movement action per round.
ACTION.TagNaturalTooltip: This action involves performing a natural weapon attack.
ACTION.TagNonCombatTooltip: Actions which can only be performed outside of a Combat encounter.
ACTION.TagOneHandTooltip: This action requires wielding a one-handed weapon.
ACTION.TagProjectileTooltip: This action requires use of a projectile weapon.
ACTION.TagRallyingTooltip: This action provides restoration by testing an ally's Madness threshold.
ACTION.TagRangedTooltip: This action requires wielding a ranged weapon to perform.
ACTION.TagReactionTooltip: This action can only be performed during some other creature's turn when its activation condition is met.
ACTION.TagReloadTooltip: This action reloads a ranged weapon which requires reloading.
ACTION.TagShieldTooltip: This action requires wielding a shield to perform.
ACTION.TagSkillTooltip: This action involves a targeted or opposed Skill check.
ACTION.TagSummonTooltip: This action summons, calls, or otherwise creates a combatant which joins the encounter.
ACTION.TagThrownTooltip: This action involves performing a thrown weapon attack.
ACTION.TagTwoHandedTooltip: This action requires wielding a two-handed weapon to perform.
ACTION.TagOffHandTooltip: This action utilizes your off-hand weapon to make an attack.
ACTION.TagUnarmedTooltip: This action requires you to be fully unarmed in order to perform.
ACTION.TagUnarmoredTooltip: This action requires you to be unarmored in order to perform.
ACTION.TagIconicSpellTooltip: This action is an Iconic Spell learned through mastery of its components.
ACTION.TagTargetTooltip: The target type, distance, and number which applies to this action.
ACTION.TagCostTooltip: The Action Point or Focus Point cost of using this action.

ACTION.ACTIONS.DELETE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you wish to delete the {name} action from the {parent} {type}?

WARNINGS.CannotAfford: The following actors cannot afford the cost of this enricher: {actors}
WARNINGS.InvalidTerms: Unable to parse {terms} as valid award terms.
WARNINGS.RequiresGM: You must be a Gamemaster to use Award enrichers.

abilities.label: Ability Scaling
abilities.hint: Define how the ability scores for creatures of this Archetype scale as they advance in level. Allocate 12 points across all Ability scores. Each ability score must be between zero and 6. Adversaries will increase their abilities by 1 point each level. Scores with a higher value advance more frequently. Scores which are zero will not ever advance from their base value.

identifier.label: Identifier
identifier.hint: A string identifier used to uniquely reference this Archetype in tags, actions, or other UI elements. This identifier must be alphanumeric with no spaces or special characters.

talents.label: Granted Talents
talents.hint: Configure one or more talents which this Archetype receives automatically.

equipment.label: Granted Equipment
equipment.hint: Configure equipment which this Archetype receives automatically.

skills.label: Favored Skills
skills.hint: Configure a selection of skills that will automatically progress their training rank for this Archetype.

identifier.label: Identifier
identifier.hint: A string identifier used to uniquely reference this Background in tags, actions, or other UI elements. This identifier must be alphanumeric with no spaces or special characters.

knowledge.label: Knowledge Areas
knowledge.hint: Configure knowledge areas that this Background provides automatically. Typically, a Background features two knowledge areas.

languages.label: Known Languages
languages.hint: Configure languages that this Background provides automatically.

skills.label: Granted Skills
skills.hint: Configure skills which this Background provides automatically with novice training. Typically, a Background has training in two skills.

talents.label: Acquired Talents
talents.hint: Configure one or more talents which this Background receives automatically. Typically, a Background receives two granted talents.

color.label: Background Color
color.hint: A representative color for this Background used when referring to them in the user interface.

icon.label: Background Icon
icon.hint: A small icon used to represent this Background in the user interface.

SHEET.TALENT_DROP: Add a talent to this Background by dragging and dropping from the Talents compendium pack.

ERRORS.APPLY: You may only apply a background to a level 0 character with no spent skill points.
ERRORS.TALENT_TIER: Backgrounds may only offer Tier 0 starting Talents.

COMBAT.WarningCannotChangeRound: Only a Gamemaster user may change the Combat round.

uses.label: Uses
uses.hint: Configure a limited number of uses of this consumable item before it becomes depleted.
uses.value.label: Value
uses.max.label: Maximum

STATUSES.FlankedDescription: You are flanked by multiple enemies who gain additional Boons to their attacks!

identifier.label: Identifier
identifier.hint: A unique string identifier used to reference this Item. Multiple copies of this same item all share the same identifier.

public.label: Public Description
public.hint: A description of this item which is visible to any user with at least OBSERVER permission.

private.label: Secret Description
private.hint: A description of this item which is only visible to Gamemaster users.

SHEET.TALENT_DROP: Add a talent by dragging and dropping a Talent item into this area.
SHEET.EQUIPMENT_DROP: Add starting equipment by dragging and dropping items into this area.

KEYBINDINGS.ConfirmActionHint: Confirm actions recorded within the last 60 seconds in the order in which they were taken.
RULER.CannotAffordMove: You cannot afford to move {distance} spaces which costs {action} Action points.

dc.label: Difficulty Challenge
dc.hint: Assign the value which must be exceeded on a crafting skill check to succeed on crafting this schematic.

hours.label: Hours
hours.hint: The amount of time, in hours, that attempted crafting requires.

consumed.label: Consumed
consumed.hint: Are these ingredients consumed in the process of attempted crafting?

currency.label: Currency
currency.hint: Crafting this schematic may require some amount of currency used to represent required supplies or minor ingredients which are not explicitly modeled as items.

SETTINGS.AutoConfirmHint: Enable auto-confirmation of actions in combat which do not deal damage or cause active effects. This can speed things up but is not recommended during play-testing.
SETTINGS.CruciblePartyHint: Configure which which Group Actor is the primary group of protagonists.

EXPLORATION.label: Exploration
EXPLORATION.hint: Exploration skills pertain to your ability to traverse the world and meet its challenges.

KNOWLEDGE.label: Knowledge
KNOWLEDGE.hint: Knowledge skills pertain to your character's learning and understanding across a range of topics.

SOCIAL.label: Social
SOCIAL.hint: Social skills pertain to your character's ability to interact with other people or groups.

CRAFTING.label: Tradecraft
CRAFTING.hint: Artisanal skills reflecting your character's ability to create items or equipment.

UNTRAINED.label: Untrained
UNTRAINED.hint: You have no formal training in this area. Any success you have in applying this skill is due to common sense or luck.

UNSPECIALIZED.label: Unspecialized
UNSPECIALIZED.hint: You have not yet attained a specialization path for this skill.

NOVICE.label: Novice
NOVICE.hint: You have some formal training or practical experience in the fundamental applications of this skill.

APPRENTICE.label: Apprentice
APPRENTICE.hint: You have refined and honed the techniques of this skill to a strong functional competence.

SPECIALIST.label: Specialist
SPECIALIST.hint: Your proficiency with this skill is heightened by expertise in an advanced specialization path.

ADEPT.label: Adept
ADEPT.hint: You are a subject matter expert and fluent in all base competencies and applications of this skill.

MASTER.label: Master
MASTER.hint: You are peerless in your mastery of this skill and of your advanced specialization path.

SKILL.ChoosePath: You must choose a specialization path before advancing this Skill further.
SKILL.CantAfford: You cannot afford to increase this skill. The next rank costs {cost} points and you have {points} skill points available.

actions.label: Granted Actions
actions.hint: Associate Actions which are available to characters which know this Iconic Spell.

runes.label: Runes
runes.hint: The set of Runes which must be known in order to learn this Iconic Spell.

gestures.label: Gestures
gestures.hint: The set of Gestures which must be known in order to learn this Iconic Spell.

inflections.label: Inflections
inflections.hint: The set of Inflections which must be known in order to learn this Iconic Spell.

nodes.label: Talent Nodes
nodes.hint: Assign this Talent to be purchased from one or more particular nodes in the Talent Tree.

actions.label: Granted Actions
actions.hint: Associate Actions which are available to characters which possess this Talent.

rune.label: Rune
rune.hint: Obtaining this talent grants knowledge of a specific spellcraft Rune.

gesture.label: Gesture
gesture.hint: Obtaining this talent grants knowledge of a specific spellcraft Gesture.

inflection.label: Inflection
inflection.hint: Obtaining this talent grants knowledge of a specific spellcraft Inflection.

iconicSpells.label: Iconic Spells
iconicSpells.hint: A number of Iconic Spell slots that are granted by this Talent.

actorHooks.label: Hooked Functions
actorHooks.hint: This configuration tab involves advanced features for automating talent effects. Mis-configuring data on this tab can have serious consequences. Do not attempt to make changes here unless you are confident in your own knowledge.

training.label: Provided Training
training.hint: Does this talent provide some rank of training in a particular area?
training.type.label: Training Type
training.rank.label: Training Rank

WARNINGS.AlreadyOwned: You already own {name} and cannot add it a second time.
WARNINGS.Banned: You cannot purchase additional Signature talents at this node or tier.
WARNINGS.CannotAfford: You do not have sufficient Talent points to purchase {name} which costs {cost} points.
WARNINGS.Inaccessible: You are unable to acquire "{name}" because you have not unlocked this talent tree node.
WARNINGS.Locked: You do not satisfy the requirements to acquire "{name}" which requires {requires} {requirement}.
WARNINGS.RequiresRuneGesture: You must know a spellcraft Rune in order to utilize a Gesture.
WARNINGS.RequiresRuneInflection: You must know a spellcraft Rune in order to utilize an Inflection.

abilities.label: Base Abilities
abilities.hint: Define the initial ability scores for creatures with this Taxonomy. Allocate 12 points across all Ability scores. Each ability score must be between zero and 6. Ability scores which are assigned zero cannot ever be non-zero for adversaries of this Taxonomy.

category.label: Category
category.hint: The category of creature that this Taxonomy belongs to.

identifier.label: Identifier
identifier.hint: A string identifier used to uniquely reference this Taxonomy in tags, actions, or other UI elements. This identifier must be alphanumeric with no spaces or special characters.

resistances.label: Resistance Scaling
resistances.hint: Define how the resistances and vulnerabilities for creatures of this Taxonomy scale as they advance in level. Assign values to each resistance between -3 (most vulnerable) and +3 (most resistant). Damage types set to zero are neither resistant nor vulnerable. The total across all resistances must sum to zero.

size.label: Size
size.hint: The size of this adversary in grid spaces.

stride.label: Stride
stride.tooltip: Movement distance per spent Action Point.

damageType.label: Damage Type
damageType.hint: Configure the type of damage dealt by this weapon.

dropped.label: Dropped
dropped.hint: Has this weapon been thrown, disarmed, or otherwise dropped?

loaded.label: Loaded
loaded.hint: If this weapon requires loading, track whether it is currently loaded.

slot.label: Equipped Slot
slot.hint: Specify which equipment slot this weapon is equipped in.

TAGS.AmbushTooltip: This weapon is well-suited to striking before your opponents get a chance to react. When attacking a target lower than you in the initiative order you gain +1 Boon.
TAGS.BlockingTooltip: This weapon provides a bonus to your Block defense.
TAGS.EngagingTooltip: Weapons in this category allow you to better combat multiple foes, increasing your Engagement by +1.
TAGS.KeenTooltip: This weapon is particularly deadly when it achieves a critical hit. IMPORTANT NOTE - the keen property is not yet implemented in the playtest.
TAGS.NaturalTooltip: Natural weapons benefit from Natural Weapon Training rather than training from their actual category. Natural weapons cannot be dropped.
TAGS.OversizedTooltip: This item is over-sized or otherwise cumbersome to wield, preventing you from acting quickly. You have +2 banes to Initiative while this item is equipped.
TAGS.ParryingTooltip: This weapon provides a bonus to your Parry defense.
TAGS.ReachTooltip: This weapon provides a larger than normal effective range. You are able to perform basic Strike attacks at twice your normal range.
TAGS.ReloadTooltip: This weapon requires reloading in order to strike. When the weapon is not loaded, any actions which use the weapon cost +1 Action Points.
TAGS.ReliableTooltip: This weapon is trustworthy and almost never produces spectacularly bad outcomes. The critical failure threshold of the weapon is reduced by 2 making it less likely that unsuccessful Strikes yield a critical miss.
TAGS.ReturningTooltip: This weapon is magically or mechanically engineered to return to your hand after being thrown. Using the Throw Weapon action with this weapon does not result in it becoming Dropped.
TAGS.ThrownTooltip: This weapon is designed to be suitable for throwing and does not suffer the Banes penalty that is usually applied to the Throw Weapon action.
TAGS.VersatileTooltip: This weapon can be wielded with either one or two hands, and switched between these modes without any Action Point cost. While wielded in two hands, the weapon gains an additional +2 base damage but incurs 1 additional Action cost to Strike.
TAGS.DamageTooltip: A shorthand representation of the offensive capabilities of this weapon, expressed as Attack Bonus / Damage Bonus / Damage Multiplier.

walk.label: Walk
walk.description: Move a distance up to your Stride attribute per Action.

step.label: Step
step.description: Move cautiously a distance up to half your Stride attribute per Action. This movement does not provoke disengagement.

crawl.label: Crawl
crawl.description: Move while Prone a distance up to half your Stride attribute per Action.

jump.label: Jump
jump.description: Leap to traverse a distance up to half your Stride attribute per Action.

climb.label: Climb
climb.description: Climb or descend a surface, a distance or elevation up to half your Stride attribute per Action. Creatures with an explicit Climb speed instead use this speed instead of half their Stride.

swim.label: Swim
swim.description: Move through water that is waist-deep or deeper a distance up to half your Stride attribute per Action. Creatures with an explicit Swim speed instead use this speed instead of half their Stride.

fly.label: Fly
fly.description: Move through the air a distance up to your Fly attribute per Action. Only creatures with a Fly speed can use this movement mode.

WARNING.AbilityCannotIncrease: You cannot increase this Ability further.
WARNING.AbilityCannotDecrease: You cannot decrease this Ability further.
WARNING.AbilityRequireAncestry: You must assign an Ancestry before you can purchase Ability increases.
WARNING.CannotEquipSlotInUse: Actor {actor} cannot equip {item} because the {type} item slot is already in use.
WARNING.CannotEquipInCombat: Actor {actor} cannot equip or un-equip {item} during a combat encounter.
WARNING.CannotEquipActionCost: You cannot equip weaponry because you have no Action points available.
WARNING.CannotEquipInvalidCategory: Actor {actor} cannot use {item} in the {type} equipment slot.
WARNING.NoParty: You must have a primary party configured for this.
WARNING.SkillRequireAncestryBackground: You must assign both Ancestry and Background before you can purchase Skill ranks.
WALKTHROUGH.AddAncestry: Choose an Ancestry from the Compendium or Items sidebar and add it via drag-and-drop.
WALKTHROUGH.AddBackground: Choose a Background from the Compendium or Items sidebar and add it via drag-and-drop.
WALKTHROUGH.ConfigureArchetype: Configure an Archetype for this adversary.
WALKTHROUGH.ConfigureTaxonomy: Configure a Taxonomy for this adversary.
WALKTHROUGH.AbilityPoints: Spend available Ability Points by increasing your Ability scores.
WALKTHROUGH.SkillPoints: Spend available Skill Points by increasing your Skill ranks.
WALKTHROUGH.TalentPoints: Spend available Talent Points by opening the Talent Tree.
WALKTHROUGH.LevelZero: Complete all character creation steps before advancing your character to Level 1.
WALKTHROUGH.LevelOne: Set your character to Level 1 and begin your adventure!
WALKTHROUGH.LevelUp: You have made enough progress to advance to a new level. Increase your level by one when you are ready!
WALKTHROUGH.LevelZeroIncomplete: You may not advance to Level 1 until you have finished all character creation steps!
